website_summaries.verdict: An industrial style bar cart that provides a great amount of organization.
pros: Heavy-duty wheels lock in place for extra security
Protected shelves will keep objects from falling off
cons: Wheels can get caught up on carpet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cart for medical equipment that I use in different rooms of our home. The cart was very easy to assemble, sturdy, easy to roll. I am very please with the purchase. Great value! And getting it on Amazon made it so I didn't have to drive anywhere to get it. I had one question and customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Sooo easy to put together and really nice quality for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sooo easy to put together and really nice quality for the price. I specifically used this cart for stacking jewelry containers, so I could see everything I have more easily. But this unit can be used in office, bath, living, kitchen, pantry or garage. I will get one for my mum and have her put all her canned items she stores in her garage so she can get to them more easily and can shift the cart around as needed. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first day!
customer_reviews.text: The wheel broke off the bottom after one day. The bottom part of the metal where you screw the wheel in came unattached. I'm guessing it was not welded very well. I did not contact or try to return though. I just had my brother weld it back on and spot weld the other legs to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but it's perfect. I use it to place breads a cereal. Easy to put together in less than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Msredstar

customer_reviews.title: Useful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used for medical equipment; now for shoes. Great item, somewhat too small for all machines we had.
customer_reviews.author: s terronez

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy cart, I did not read the size correctly and it is to small for my microwave. My microwave is 20 x 15 and the cart is wide enough but not deep enough.. I will use the cart some where else and next time I order will double check the size
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cart
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I was looking for a small cart to store items. This cart is the size I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: DEP

customer_reviews.title: The cart broke
customer_reviews.text: The cart was easy to assemble. It was the perfect size for us. I used it for a few days for our daily homeschool supplies until a weld broke and a wheel fell off as I was moving it on a smooth tile floor. I see now that I’m not the only one who got a defective cart. I wish I had saved the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mc

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Great cart but one of the wheels kept coming off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rolls easily and perfect size to tuck away
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was wanting. It is lightweight, rolls easily and perfect size to tuck away. It was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Wells

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the quality of this shelving unit
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of this shelving unit. I like the fact it is a good looking unit and can be on wheels or has protective plugs if not using the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Lana D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf next to my laundry room sink. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: ToniC

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wheel broke off shortly after receiving, replacement side sent. Broke again.. waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Using it as an end table. It’s a good height and I like having the extra storage. Plus, the price is right. 4 stars because the shelves are a little awkward to put on. On one of them the gaps are too small to get it to fit properly. Picture to help explain what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: iluvamazon

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it's a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it's a bit small, but it does the job. I use it to hold my tools in my beauty shop.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what the description provides potential buyers. Very sturdy for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: James Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed to use it for in our office.
customer_reviews.author: Tresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy cart. It fits in my utility room really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cast for my craft room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cast for my craft room!!! Fits my printer and my cricut explore air PERFECTLY!! it is short which I love! I didn’t want it taller than my desk! All over great product for price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item broke after 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item but together and 2 days later the wheel broke off. Used it for laundry detergent and cleaning supplies, only used it twice.
customer_reviews.author: S Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product for crafting items
customer_reviews.text: Love these carts! Very useful and easy to put together. Holds many different crafting items. Holds up well. Have several.
customer_reviews.author: Moriko

customer_reviews.title: BUY
customer_reviews.text: Perfection at a great price. Has the option to use or not use wheels. Would suggest others to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Have had it awhile - nice and sturdy and hasn't given me any problems - love the lock on the wheel
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this product again. The quality was mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.author: imogencoco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to set up and it's perfect to put my aesthetic stuff on
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: The cart revived is so lop sided it won’t even ...
customer_reviews.text: The cart revived is so lop sided it won’t even roll properly . The tray tops at also not laying flat. I can’t even use this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do like the fact that I don't have to put the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for my microwave. It works for it but it is small. I do like the fact that I don't have to put the wheels on it if I don't need to.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer
